name: 賴明鈞
objective: 先修課程：3002012或負責教授同意。介紹有關機械設計的流程、考慮因素、分析方法、破壞理論，以及基本機械元件的設計，包刮各種非永久性扣件、彈簧、軸及軸承、以及傳動元件(如皮帶、鏈條、齒輪)等。
schedule:
1. Introduction to Mechanical Design
2. Load and Stress Analysis
3. Load and Stress Analysis
4. Deflection and Stiffness
5. Deflection and Stiffness
6. Failures Resulting from Static Loading
7. Failures Resulting from Static Loading
8. Fatigue Failure Resulting from Variable Loading
9. 期中考
10.Fatigue Failure Resulting from Variable Loading
11.Fatigue Failure Resulting from Variable Loading
12.Design of Nonpermanent Joints
13.Design of Nonpermanent Joints
14.Design of Mechanical Springs
15.Design of Mechanical Springs
16.Design of Shafts and Bearings
17.Design of Transmission Elements
18.期末考
scorePolicy:
作業與課堂表現  佔15%
小考成績  佔15%
期中考  佔30%
期末考  佔40%
materials:
教科書：J. E. Shigley, C. R. Mischke, and R. G. Budynas,
“Mechanical Engineering Design,” 7th Ed., 2004, McGraw-Hill
